text: Vasu Inturi (, born 30 December 1975), is a Telugu actor. He is known for the role of Sarvam in the TV show Amrutham. He worked as an assistant director and director on the series and wrote some episodes.Amrutham Serial Wiki Later, he wrote and directed the hit TV series Gangatho Rambabu."Inturi Vasu" at IMDb In 2014, he co-wrote Chandamama Lo Amrutham, the first Indian space comedy film, with Gangaraju Gunnam.http://amruthamthemovie.com/crew.html ==Filmography== === In Films === {| class="wikitable" !Year !Name !Role !Director |- |2005 |Anukokunda Oka Roju | |Chandra Sekhar Yeleti |- |2008 |Ashta Chamma |Ranga |Mohan Krishna Indraganti |- |2008 |John Apparao 40+ | |Kuchipudi Venkat |- |2011 |Poison | | |- |2011 |Golconda High School | |Mohan Krishna Indraganti |- |2011 |Pilla Zamindar |Tuition master of PJ | |- |2013 |Sahasam |Goutham's Friend |Chandra Sekhar Yeleti |- |2014 |Amrutham Chandamamalo |Sarvam | |- |2014 |A Shyam Gopal Varma Film | | |- |2015 |Courier Boy Kalyan |Ward boy |Premsai |- |2016 |Rojulu Marayi | | |- |2018 |Krishnarjuna Yudham | |Merlapaka Gandhi |- |2018 |Chalo |canteen owner |Nalla seenu |- |2019 |N.T.R: Kathanayakudu |Tatineni Prakash Rao |Krish (director) |} === In Serials === {| class="wikitable" |+ !Year !Name !Role |- |2001 - 2007 |Amrutham |Sarvam |- |2016 - 2018 |Saradaga Kasepu |Bellam Bhaskar |- |2018 - Present |Rendu Rellu Aaru |Obul Reddy (Scientist) |} ==References== ==External links== * http://www.amruthamserial.com/p/amrutham-serial-wiki.html * http://amruthamthemovie.com/crew.html * Vasu Inturi full info at sono bio Category:Living people Category:Telugu male actors Category:Telugu comedians Category:Indian television directors Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Male actors in Telugu television Category:Indian male comedians Category:Male actors in Telugu cinema Category:21st-century Indian male actors
